body.p:
217
October 31 3.
Lt. Jno W. Walls
2 Ky. Battery
Sir,

Your communication of the 22d instant, to the Governor has been referred by him to this Department. If you desire to recruit a Battery you can have the permission -- but before you can be commissioned you must first recruit the men when you will be commissioned and take rank according to the number of men you recruit. If you are confident you would recruit a Battery of course you would be commissioned Captain so soon as they were mustered into service.

Yours respy
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
